settings.title: Shipping
settings.message:
Lontreau ships products to most countries worldwide. If you live outside of the US or Canada, shipping costs will be calculated at checkout. US and Canadian addresses are eligible for free shipping on orders over $99. 

Orders are shipped using Canada Post. Following checkout, you will receive an order confirmation email which will include a tracking number with Canada Post.

If you entered an incorrect address, please email us with the correct address before your order is shipped. If the order has already been shipped, we are unable to make changes to the shipping address.

settings.title: Order Cancellation
settings.message: If your order has not yet been shipped, we will be happy (but sad inside) to cancel your order and offer you a refund. Please email hello@lontreau.com to request cancellation.

settings.title: Order Processing Times
settings.message: Lontreau processes orders Monday - Friday and we strive to ship orders within 24 hours of purchase. Orders placed on Saturday and Sunday are processed on the next business day.

settings.title: Returns & Refunds
settings.message:
If you are not satisfied with your Lontreau products, please contact our team at hello@lontreau.com to request a Return Authorization Number. Returns without an RA# will not be accepted. Please mail product returns to: 

Lontreau Customer Service,  Attn: Returns, 408-1788 West Broadway, Vancouver BC V6J 1Y1

Once we receive your returned product, we will issue a refund to the original form of payment. Products may be returned for up to 30 days after the delivery date of the package. At this time we do not offer return shipping.

settings.title: Sensitive Skin Guarantee
settings.message:
Lontreau has a 30 day skin sensitivity guarantee. Our products are formulated for all skin types and will not cause any skin reactivity. 

If you are not fully satisfied with your Lontreau products, please contact our customer service team to initiate a return within 30 days of receiving your order. No questions asked but we will be grateful for any feedback you have!

settings.title: Are Lontreau products made with sustainable ingredients?
settings.message: In the process of formulating Lontreau products, careful consideration was given to the raw ingredients selected for our formulations. Whenever possible we selected ingredients from manufacturers committed to sustainable practices. Our formulations incorporate responsibly sourced, natural, renewable ingredients made in Canada.
